attributes.action: ban the slaughter of lambs and slaughter sheep instead!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eating lambs is wrong and evil! Wait until they are sheep and them eat them!!! YOU GET MORE MEET AND THE ANIMAL HAS HAD A FUN AND FULL-FILLED LIFE!! THINK PEOPLE - BIGGER, CHEAPER KEBABS!!! POWER TO THE LAMBS!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
